channel.title: New idee The litizen VS the courtwizards
channel.description:
some 1 tought this would be a good idee so why not lets see how this will end up
>**Savagezen** :facepunch: *Neutral Zen* **PUNCH (Day)** - Punch someone. If they are not a Zen, they will be bled. If they are Pest Control, they die. (Infinite) **Smort and shit (Passive)** - You have a list of names of all chill/litizens, along with Pest Control. You do not know their exact roles. **Protecc (Night)** - Protect someone from death. (Infinite) *Goal: See that the majority of the Zens survive (excluding boring citizens), and that Pest Control is killed if they are in the game.*** created bye Nerbins
> # Chillizen :snowflake: > > > > *Neutral Social* > **Chill (Day)** - Chill. - Unlimited uses. > **Chill (Night)** - Chill. - Unlimited uses. > *You win no matter what. So just lay back and chill.* created bye psychoneirik (Time to finish what you started)
>Antisocial Litizen :fire: :fire: > >**Neutral Antisocial** > >**Lit (Passive)** - You have no abilities except being lit as fuck, in reality. > >**Vote (Day)** - Cast a vote inthread - :100: uses *You win if you are the only Neutral remaining at any point in the game. Upon victory you will leave the game.* created bye Icibalus
**Halloween Costume Litizen**
>**Neutral offensive** **Great costume (Passive)** each time you visited a player you will have a extra 25% chance to get a treat instead of a trick. You start with 1 treat. **Stressfull Eater (Passive)** whenever you get attacked because of a trick you will consume a treat to heal yourself back to health. **Trick Or Treat Run (Night)** target a player you have a 50% chance to get a treat and a 50% chance to get a trick. If you get a trick you will be attack tonight, if you get a treat you will store it in your bag for later -Infinite uses **Halloween PARTY (Night)** You will occupy all players who visited you tonight you will be informed who visited you and you will gain a extra treat if you use **Trick or Treat Run** on them- 2 uses > >*have 7 treats at the end of the game.*
> **Halloween Zombie Litizen** *special Litizen* **Undead??? (Passive)** You will consume 2 treats to come back to life whenever you die. **Trick Or Treat Run (Night)** target a player you have a 50% chance to get a treat and a 50% chance to get a trick. If you get a trick you will be attack tonight, if you get a treat you will store it in your bag for later -Infinite uses *win with the other litizens*

item.title: New idee The litizen VS the courtwizards
item.dc:creator: justaneut
item.description:
some 1 tought this would be a good idee so why not lets see how this will end up

Savagezen
Neutral Zen
PUNCH (Day) - Punch someone. If they are not a Zen, they will be bled. If they are Pest Control, they die. (Infinite)
Smort and shit (Passive) - You have a list of names of all chill/litizens, along with Pest Control. You do not know their exact roles.
Protecc (Night) - Protect someone from death. (Infinite)
Goal: See that the majority of the Zens survive (excluding boring citizens), and that Pest Control is killed if they are in the game.**
created bye Nerbins

Chillizen

Neutral Social
Chill (Day) - Chill. - Unlimited uses.
Chill (Night) - Chill. - Unlimited uses.
You win no matter what. So just lay back and chill.
created bye psychoneirik (Time to finish what you started)

Antisocial Litizen

Neutral Antisocial

Lit (Passive) - You have no abilities except being lit as fuck, in reality.

Vote (Day) - Cast a vote inthread - uses
You win if you are the only Neutral remaining at any point in the game. Upon victory you will leave the game.
created bye Icibalus

Halloween Costume Litizen

Neutral offensive
Great costume (Passive) each time you visited a player you will have a extra 25% chance to get a treat instead of a trick. You start with 1 treat.
Stressfull Eater (Passive) whenever you get attacked because of a trick you will consume a treat to heal yourself back to health.
Trick Or Treat Run (Night) target a player you have a 50% chance to get a treat and a 50% chance to get a trick. If you get a trick you will be attack tonight, if you get a treat you will store it in your bag for later -Infinite uses
Halloween PARTY (Night) You will occupy all players who visited you tonight you will be informed who visited you and you will gain a extra treat if you use Trick or Treat Run on them- 2 uses

have 7 treats at the end of the game.

Halloween Zombie Litizen
special Litizen
Undead??? (Passive) You will consume 2 treats to come back to life whenever you die.
Trick Or Treat Run (Night) target a player you have a 50% chance to get a treat and a 50% chance to get a trick. If you get a trick you will be attack tonight, if you get a treat you will store it in your bag for later -Infinite uses
win with the other litizens

Read full topic
item.source: New idee The litizen VS the courtwizards
